Thu Dec 28 03:12:00 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/bin/libassuan-config /opt/bin//libassuan-config
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/include/assuan.h /opt/include//assuan.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.la /opt/lib//libassuan.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so.0.8.6 /opt/lib//libassuan.so.0.8.6
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so /opt/lib//libassuan.so
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/pkgconfig/libassuan.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/libassuan.pc
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so.0 /opt/lib//libassuan.so.0
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//info
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/info/assuan.info /opt/share//info/assuan.info
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/aclocal/libassuan.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/libassuan.m4
